file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Deep Art Generator API
  version: 0.1.0

paths:
  /job:
    post:
      summary: Post a new job
      description: |
        The API returns `style_image_url` and `content_image_url` to upload style and content image, respectively. 
      requestBody:
        required: false
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                style_weight:
                  type: number
                content_weight:
                  type: number
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  job_id:
                    type: string
                  state:
                    type: string
                    enum: ["submitted", "processing", "completed", "failed"]
                  style_image_url:
                    type: string
                  content_image_url:
                    type: string
  /job/{item_id}:
    parameters:
      - in: path
        name: item_id
        required: true
        description: ID of the job
        schema:
          type: string
    get:
      summary: Get the result of the job
      description: |
        `generated_image_url` is returned only if the `status` is `completed`.
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  job_id:
                    type: string
                  status:
                    type: string
                    enum: ["submitted", "processing", "completed", "failed"]
                  style_image_url:
                    type: string
                  content_image_url:
                    type: string
                  generated_image_url:
                    type: string
    delete:
      summary: Delete the job
      responses:
        204:
          description: Resource deleted successfully
